title: How to send WhatsApp message online - Quora

response.answer_text: Download app.2. Register with your phone number. 3. Allow app to connect with the contacts you have saved on your phone. 4. Now go through these contacts on WhatsApp (there is a top right button looking like a pencil and a notepad (if you are an Apple user) that’s where you find them on WhatsApp). 5. Click on contact and send a message.
